headerSessao: abaixo é a sessão do header (isso é um comentário)
texto-sobre-mim: I'm a developer in love for create aplications and contents in the criative way. My principal focus is on back-end development, using C# and Next.Js, but I also like to explore new technologies in front-end.
funFacts: I'm a fan of philosophy and horror books.
I'm always looking to learn new technologies.
Movies that make us reflect are my favorites.
Nothing like a walk to relax.
I like to challenge myself with innovative projects.
I seek creative solutions to complex problems.
Drawing and art are ways for me to express myself.
Artificial Intelligence fascinates me more and more.
Traveling inspires me to create and explore.

CSharp.Destaques: Back-end development and REST API integration.

Python.Destaques: Task automation, web development with Django, and process automation.

JavaScript.Destaques: Web development and web script creation.

API.Destaques: Use of APIs in personal projects. Check out the 'Projects' section.

OOP.Destaques: Use of classes, attributes, interfaces, and RPG game development.

CSS3.Destaques: Responsive design, CSS animations, and preprocessors.

Angular.Destaques: Creation of SPAs and REST API consumption.

Django.Destaques: Web application development and database integration.

Docker.Destaques: Application containerization and use of custom images.

AWS.Destaques: Good knowledge of cloud computing and AWS services.
